ItemCreateDialog.title: Add Item
ItemCreateDialog.description: Add a new item in the inventory.
ItemCreateDialog.failure_message: Failed to create item. Please try again.

ItemEditDialog.title: Edit Item
ItemEditDialog.description: Update the details for this item.
ItemEditDialog.failure_message: Failed to update item. Please try again.

ItemDeleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
ItemDeleteDialog.description: This will permanently delete the item(s). This action cannot be undone.
ItemDeleteDialog.failure_message: Failed to delete item(s). Please try again.

InventorySettingsForm.title: Title
InventorySettingsForm.description_placeholder: A short description of this inventory.

IDPreview.preview_description: Example of what your Custom IDs will look like.

FieldList.noFieldsMessage: No custom fields yet. Add one to get started.

FieldDeleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
FieldDeleteDialog.description: This will permanently delete the field. This action cannot be undone.
FieldDeleteDialog.failure_message: Failed to delete field. Please try again.

CustomFieldsEditor.title: Existing Fields
CustomFieldsEditor.show_in_table_description: Display this field as a column in the items table.

AccessPages.title: Collaborators
AccessPages.visibility_public_desc: This inventory is public and can be viewed by anyone.
AccessPages.visibility_private_desc: This inventory is private and only accessible to collaborators.

StatisticsPage.no_data_message: No statistics available for this inventory.
StatisticsPage.total_quantity_placeholder: Add a 'Quantity' field to see this stat.
StatisticsPage.avg_price_placeholder: Add a 'Price' field to see this stat.
StatisticsPage.avg_quantity_placeholder: Add a 'Quantity' field to see this stat.
StatisticsPage.visualize_more_data_description: Add a custom field named 'Quantity' to this inventory to see a distribution chart.
